sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.5%.
Year to date, Walt Disney has lost about 3.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Apple ( AAPL ), trading down 1.7%.
Apple is showing a gain of 2.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are DuPont ( DD ), trading down 0.5%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
